title: Mech
name: Saturn Engine II
content: Saturn Engine II - The Ghosts of Creuss mech unit. Cost: 2, Combat: 6, Movement: 1. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. This unit can use its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability to cancel a hit produced against another ship in this system.
answer: Saturn Engine II is the Ghosts of Creuss mech. It has SUSTAIN DAMAGE and a unique ability: This unit can use its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability to cancel a hit produced against another ship in this system. This makes it exceptionally useful for protecting valuable ships like flagships or dreadnoughts in space combat.
